latlon2map 0.0.0.9002
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Removing the boring parts from geocomputation with European data

    Regions and provinces in Italy (high detail, CC-BY Istat)

    ll_get_nuts_it.Rd

    2019 / WGS84 UTM32N

    ll_get_nuts_it(
  name = NULL,
  level = 2,
  year = 2021,
  resolution = "low",
  silent = FALSE,
  no_check_certificate = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    level

    Defaults to "2", i.e. regioni. Available: "3" (i.e. province), and "lau", local administrative units.

    year

    Defaults to 2021 (latest available).

    no_check_certificate

    Logical, defaults to FALSE. Enable only if certificate issues, and if you are aware of the security implications.

    Value

    Examples

    ll_set_folder("~/R/")
#> [1] "~/R/"
ll_get_nuts_it()
